mxc_dma_requestbuf Struct Reference


Data Fields

dma_addr_t src_addr
dma_addr_t dst_addr
int num_of_bytes

Detailed Description

This structure contains the information about a dma transfer

Field Documentation

dma_addr_t dst_addr

destination address

int num_of_bytes

the length of this transfer : bytes

dma_addr_t src_addr

source address
